title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: The StyledText should only redraw the affected lines when new lines are appended in word wrap mode.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Add the following line to the performPaint method of StyledText: System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
2. Append N lines to the StyledText in word wrap mode.
3. Observe that the entire client area is redrawn N times, which is inefficient.
